params._isLocal: true if new owner is on Scroll, false if it is a cross-domain owner

transferOwnershipScroll(address,bool).notice: Adds functionality to the StateBridge to transfer ownership of ScrollWorldID to another contract on L1 or to a Scroll chain EOA
